author: Zuz A
content: I had the worst food poisoning in years. I thought well maybe it was just me but no!!! My friends are still sitting on a bloody toilet with an explosive diarrhoea. The food was tasty but the consequences are far beyond your imagination. Medicine afterwards will cost you more. I can recommend this place if youâ€™re trying to loose some weight because after a food poisoning you will be lighter a few pounds for sure.
